p: In this study, the tested microorganisms were five strains of the genus Cronobacter: C. condimenti s37, C. muytjensii s50, C. sakazakii lv27, C. turicensis lv53, and C. malonaticus lv31. Those strains were isolated by our team from market products of plant origin [ 35]. The tested strains were stored at −48 °C. Prior to use, they were grown freshly on a tryptone soya broth (TSB, Argenta, Poznan, Poland) according to reference [ 36].
